body_html:
I have RESOLVED - As follow:
conda install -c https://conda.anaconda.org/jjhelmus tensorflow
REFERENCE:
I found that suggestions on http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33646541/tensorflow-and-anaconda-on-ubuntu.
TESTED:
I ran the suggested TEST form the Command Line, and also from the Notebook using Python3 , and it works all fine :)

Thank you so much for all the collaboration. -
